meanings.definition: Happening at a later time; ultimate.
meanings.sent1: The eventual outcome of the game was a win for our team.
meanings.sent2: We knew the eventual winner would receive a trophy.
meanings.sent3: The eventual decision to have ice cream for dinner surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The eventual victory felt like a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The eventual arrival of the pizza delivery made everyone cheer.

meanings.definition: Coming at some later time; future.
meanings.sent1: Her eventual plan is to travel the world.
meanings.sent2: The eventual success of the project depended on teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The eventual vacation seemed like a distant dream.
meanings.sent4: The eventual opportunity to learn a new language excited her.
meanings.sent5: The eventual sunrise painted the sky with beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: Following as a result or consequence.
meanings.sent1: He eventually realized his mistake and apologized.
meanings.sent2: The rain stopped, and the sun eventualy came out.
meanings.sent3: She forgot her umbrella and eventualy got soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The team worked hard and eventualy won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The cat chased the mouse, which eventualy escaped through a small hole.
